movie.actors: Alan Howard, Elijah Wood, Noel Appleby, Sean Astin
movie.plot: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.
movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movie.writer: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
